code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{getProducts}from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProductList(){const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{setLoading(true);getProducts().then(setProducts).catch(err=>setError(err.message||"Error loading products")).finally(()=>setLoading(false));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Products"}),loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-gray-500",children:"Loading..."}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-red-600",children:error}),!loading&&!error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4",children:products.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-span-full text-gray-400",children:"No products found."}):products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white rounded shadow p-4 flex flex-col",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"font-semibold text-lg mb-2",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-gray-700 mb-2",children:["$",product.price.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"mt-auto bg-blue-600 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded hover:bg-blue-700",children:"Add to Cart"})]},product.id))})]});}export default ProductList;
